content: viima beanie by veera välimäki simple beanies are always my favorites and viima beanie is no exception in all the simplicity it s a big favorite of mine this winter i just adore the yarn used on this one partially because this color is so beautiful similar to my oak beanie from last year viima beanie is knitted from the brim up in beautiful bulky weight yarn it s even perfect for last minute gifts finished measurements 14 35 cm all sizes 16 18 40 45 cm materials yarn 1 1 skein of suoma chunky by kässäkerho pom pom 100% wool 130 yds 120 m / 150 g approx 100 130 yds 90 120 m of bulky weight yarn sample is knitted in color muste dark blue and in size 1 needles us 11 8 mm circular needle 16 40 cm long and dpns or longer circular needle if using magic loop technique adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge other a stitch marker and locking stitch markers tapestry needle and blocking aids sizing 1 2 finished measurements 16 18 40 45 cm in circumference at brim and 14 35 cm long gauge 14 stitches and 18 row = 4 10 cm in 1 x 1 ribbing unstretched using main needles after blocking pattern copyright © veera välimäki 2 the pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact veera 100rain@gmail com directions viima beanie is a ribbed hat that is worked easily from the brim up i highly recommend using a tubular cast on method for best result - see link to a good technique tutorial at the glossary using circular needle and tubular cast on co 56 64 sts carefully join in round without twisting your stitches and place a bor marker round 1 rs sm *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round repeat round 1 until the beanie measures 11 25 28 cm crown decreases round 1 rs setup round remove marker and place a locking marker to mark the first st of round slip the last st of the round back to left needle s2kp the last st of round is now decreased * k1 p1 5 6 times k1 s2kp place a locking stitch marker for each of the center sts of the centered double decreases repeat twice more from * k1 p1 to last st k1 round 2 rs no decreases knit all knit sts and purl all purl stitches until 1 st remains round 3 rs decreases *s2kp p1 k1 to 2 sts before next marked st p1 repeat from * three more times p1 k1 to last st p1 round 4 rs no decreases knit all knit sts and purl all purl stitches until 1 st remains round 5 rs decreases *s2kp k1 p1 to 2 sts before next marked st k1 repeat from * three more times k1
